chunk_text:
CheatChat: Business Requirements
●User Module
1.
User Registration and Profile Management
1.1.
User Registration :
1.1.1.
Users must provide a username, Gmail, and password to
create an account
1.2.
Login :
1.2.1.
The system should allow users to log in using their registered
credentials
1.3.

chunk_text:
credentials
1.3.
Profile Management :
1.3.1.
Users should have the ability to view and edit their profiles
1.4.
Password Management:
1.4.1.
Users must be able to change their password through the
profile settings.
2.
Interview Selection
2.1.
Choose Interview Type:
2.1.1.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 0, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
2.1.1.
The system must allow users to select between different
interview types (e.g., behavioral, technical).
3.
Video Interaction
3.1.
View, Record, Download Videos:
3.1.1.
Users can view recorded videos.
3.1.2.
Users must start recording a video for the system to start
analyzing the video.
3.1.3.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 0, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
3.1.3.
Users should be able to download their interviewe’s video
4.
Receiving Questions
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 0, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
4.1.
Receive Questions :
4.1.1.
The system should provide users with interview questions
based on the chosen interview type.
5.
Feedback, Results and Report Viewing
5.1.
View Results & Reports:
5.1.1.
After completing the interviews, users should be able to view
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 1, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
detailed performance results and reports.
5.1.2.
Users should be able to view instructions to improve his
performance in interviews.
5.1.3.
Users should be able to view their interview questions and his
answers.
6.
ChatBot
6.1.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 1, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
6.
ChatBot
6.1.
Users will have a chatbot that they can talk with about interview questions.
7.
Support
7.1.
Technical Support :
7.1.1.
Users should be able to report a technical problem.
7.2.
Assistant Chatbot :
7.2.1.
The system should have a chatbot to provide immediate technical
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 1, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
support and address user issues.
8.
Subscription and Payment
8.1.
Free Trial :
8.1.1.
Users should have the option to use the platform on a trial basis
before subscribing.
8.2.
Subscription Options:
8.2.1.
Users can choose between monthly and annual subscription plans.
8.3.
Payment Option :
8.3.1.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 1, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
8.3.1.
Users should be able to choose between different payment
methods such as credit card or wallet.
8.3.2.
Users should be able to add new payment methods and confirm
payments.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 1, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
8.4.
Payment Confirmation:
8.4.1.
Users should receive a confirmation after every payment.
8.5.
Payment Support:
8.5.1.
Provide support for payment issues, including assistance,
problem-solving, and refunds.
8.6.
Notifications:
8.6.1.
The system must send reminders for subscription renewals,
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 2, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
upcoming interviews, and other relevant activities.
●Admin Module
1.
User and Account Management
1.1.
Create User Account:
1.1.1.
Admins should be able to create user accounts manually.
1.2.
Edit User Account :
1.2.1.
Admins must be able to edit and manage user profiles.
1.3.
Monitor User Activity:
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 2, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
1.3.1.
Admins should have access to monitor the activity of users (e.g.,
completed interviews, payments).
2.
System Management
2.1.
System Updates
2.1.1.
Admins should manage system updates, ensuring the latest
features and bug fixes are implemented.
2.2.
Content Management
2.2.1.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 2, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
2.2.1.
Admins should be able to update the content in the app.
2.3.
Review Reports
2.3.1.
Admins should be able to review feedback reports , user
interactions and overall system performance.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 2, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
3.
Payment & Subscription Management
3.1.
Monitor Payment
3.1.1.
Admins must track all user payments, ensuring all transactions are
accurate.
3.2.
Manage Subscription
3.2.1.
Admins should handle subscription plans, upgrades, and
downgrades.
4.
Security Settings
4.1.
Security Adjustions
4.1.1.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 3, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
4.1.1.
Admins must have access to adjust security settings for the
platform.
5.
Backup and Recovery Management
5.1.
Backup Management
5.1.1.
The system must allow admins to schedule and manage backups
of important & sensitive data.
5.2.
Recovery Management
5.2.1.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 3, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text:
5.2.1.
Admins should have access to recovery options in case of system
failures.
6.
Notification Management
6.1.
Update Notifications
6.1.1.
Admins should be able to send notifications and updates to users
(e.g., subscription renewal reminders, platform updates).
6.2.
Reminders
6.2.1.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 3, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

Reminders
6.2.1.
Admins should set automatic reminders for Main Events like
payment dates, trial expiry, etc.

chunk_text:
●Ai Module
1.
Question Generation
1.1.
Generate Questions:
1.1.1.
The AI system must generate specific questions for users based on
the selected interview type.
1.2.
Receive and Display Questions
1.2.1.
The AI must interact with users by receiving their inputs and

displaying relevant interview questions.
2.
Video Analysis
2.1.
Analyze Video:
2.1.1.
The AI should analyze recorded interviews and provide users with
performance feedback and improvement suggestions that are built
on body language analysis.
3.
Integration with Chatbot
3.1.
User Interaction:
3.1.1.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 4, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

3.1.1.
The AI system should be integrated with the chatbot to assist users
with technical queries or interview preparation guidance.
4.
Ai Feedback
4.1.
Provide Feedback
4.1.1.
The AI should provide users with feedback based on their
responses, either through video or text.

chunk_text:
Non-Functional Requirements
1. The app should be user-friendly and easy to navigate.
2. The app should be responsive and accessible on different devices.
3. The app should be secure and protect user data.
4. The app should have good performance and load times.
chunk_metadata: {'source': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'file_path': 'G:\\chat-Bot\\src\\assets/files\\test\\933k8kpcg1wn_CheatChat_BusinessRequirements1.pdf', 'page': 4, 'total_pages': 5, 'format': 'PDF 1.4', 'title': 'CheatChat: Business Requirements', 'author': '', 'subject': '', 'keywords': '', 'creator': '', 'producer': 'Skia/PDF m130 Google Docs Renderer', 'creationDate': '', 'modDate': '', 'trapped': ''}

chunk_text: 5. The app should be scalable to accommodate a growing user base.
